name: Out Of Place (TheTrueDuck)
description:
Follow the adventures of a lone pixel protagonist trying to find his way in a world full of vector graphics.

Made in 72 hours in the Completion Jam.

I had some trouble uploading for Windows, the package is here:
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/y0ip4sdfowhx04b/AAB-4gPx96Wd4flem3E1YcHba?dl=0
